import { Navigate, useNavigate, useOutlet, useOutletContext, } from "react-router-dom"; import MyInfoComp from "./MyInfoStyle"; import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import MemberApi from "../../api/MemberApi"; import gradeImage from "../../images/d1nrwjnej10dkwnrnksj423kj.jpg"; import { PetContext } from "./MyPage"; import { PiShoppingCartFill } from "react-icons/pi"; export default function MyInfo() { const { user } = useContext(PetContext); const navigate = useNavigate(); return (
{/* 프로필 이미지 ,이름, 이메일 , */}

{user.name}님

{user.email}

멍코인
{user.point}
{/* 등급별 이미지,등급 */}

{user.grade}

navigate("/user/mypage/mygrade")} className="grade_detail" > 내 등급 자세히 ▶

{user.cartCount}개의 상품이 기다리고있어요~

); }
